title: Cart returns to initial position from graph

content.question: An engineer measures the velocity <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of a remote-controlled cart on a straight track at regular time intervals. The data are shown in the graph above. During which of the following time intervals did the cart return to its position at time <math alttext="t equals 0 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext> </mtext><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 seconds is less than or equal to t, which is less than 5 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mtext> s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="5 seconds is less than or equal to t, which is less than 7 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mtext> s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>7</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="7 seconds is less than or equal to t, which is less than 10 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mtext> s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="10 seconds is less than or equal to t, which is less than 12 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>10</mn><mtext> s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>12</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="7 seconds is less than or equal to t, which is less than 10 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>7</mn><mtext> s</mtext><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext> s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
